14 class DAORelationsTrait {
15  abstract protected static function _getAll($className, ConditionParser $conditionParser, $included=true,$useCache=NULL);
16 
17  private static function generateManyToManyParser(ManyToManyParser $parser,&$myPkValues){
18  $sql=$parser->generateConcatSQL();
19  $result=self::$db->prepareAndFetchAll($sql,$parser->getWhereValues());
20  $condition=$parser->getParserWhereMask(" ?");
21  $cParser=new ConditionParser();
22  foreach ($result as $row){
23  $values=explode(",", $row["_concat"]);
24  $myPkValues[$row["_field"]]=$values;
25  $cParser->addParts($condition, $values);
26  }
27  $cParser->compileParts();
28  return $cParser;
29  }
30 
31  private static function _getIncludedNext($included,$member){
32  return (isset($included[$member]))?(is_bool($included[$member])?$included[$member]:[$included[$member]]):false;
33  }
34 
35  private static function getManyToManyFromArrayIds($objectClass,$relationObjects, $ids){
36  $ret=[];
37  $prop=OrmUtils::getFirstPropKey($objectClass);
38  foreach ( $relationObjects as $targetEntityInstance ) {
39  $id=Reflexion::getPropValue($targetEntityInstance,$prop);
40  if (array_search($id, $ids)!==false) {
41  array_push($ret, $targetEntityInstance);
42  }
43  }
44  return $ret;
45  }
46 
47  protected static function getIncludedForStep($included){
48  if(is_bool($included)){
49  return $included;
50  }
51  $ret=[];
52  if(is_array($included)){
53  foreach ($included as &$includedMember){
54  if(is_array($includedMember)){
55  foreach ($includedMember as $iMember){
56  self::parseEncludeMember($ret, $iMember);
57  }
58  }else{
59  self::parseEncludeMember($ret, $includedMember);
60  }
61  }
62  }
63  return $ret;
64  }
65 
66  private static function parseEncludeMember(&$ret,$includedMember){
67  $array=explode(".", $includedMember);
68  $member=array_shift($array);
69  if(sizeof($array)>0){
70  $newValue=implode(".", $array);
71  if($newValue==='*'){
72  $newValue=true;
73  }
74  if(isset($ret[$member])){
75  if(!is_array($ret[$member])){
76  $ret[$member]=[$ret[$member]];
77  }
78  $ret[$member][]=$newValue;
79  }else{
80  $ret[$member]=$newValue;
81  }
82  }else{
83  if(isset($member) && ""!=$member){
84  $ret[$member]=false;
85  }else{
86  return;
87  }
88  }
89  }
90 
91  private static function getInvertedJoinColumns($included,&$invertedJoinColumns){
92  foreach ($invertedJoinColumns as $column=>&$annot){
93  $member=$annot["member"];
94  if(isset($included[$member])===false){
95  unset($invertedJoinColumns[$column]);
96  }
97  }
98  }
99 
100  private static function getToManyFields($included,&$toManyFields){
101  foreach ($toManyFields as $member=>$annotNotUsed){
102  if(isset($included[$member])===false){
103  unset($toManyFields[$member]);
104  }
105  }
106  }
107 
108  protected static function _initRelationFields($included,$metaDatas,&$invertedJoinColumns,&$oneToManyFields,&$manyToManyFields){
109  if (isset($metaDatas["#invertedJoinColumn"])){
110  $invertedJoinColumns=$metaDatas["#invertedJoinColumn"];
111  }
112  if (isset($metaDatas["#oneToMany"])) {
113  $oneToManyFields=$metaDatas["#oneToMany"];
114  }
115  if (isset($metaDatas["#manyToMany"])) {
116  $manyToManyFields=$metaDatas["#manyToMany"];
117  }
118  if(is_array($included)){
119  if(isset($invertedJoinColumns)){
120  self::getInvertedJoinColumns($included, $invertedJoinColumns);
121  }
122  if(isset($oneToManyFields)){
123  self::getToManyFields($included, $oneToManyFields);
124  }
125  if(isset($manyToManyFields)){
126  self::getToManyFields($included, $manyToManyFields);
127  }
128  }
129  }
130 }
